abstract: Conservative and liberal observers said the video had the hallmarks of a campaign attack ad, except that it was produced and paid for by a news network rather than a candidate or a political action committee.
snippet: Conservative and liberal observers said the video had the hallmarks of a campaign attack ad, except that it was produced and paid for by a news network rather than a candidate or a political action committee.
lead_paragraph: 6:53 p.m. | Updated The Fox News Channel came under withering criticism on Wednesday for a four-minute video broadcast on its morning show “Fox & Friends” that portrayed President Obama’s tenure as a series of failed promises.

headline.main: Obama Video on Fox News Criticized as Attack Ad
